name: v2ex-tx2json
description: Convert V2EX transaction (tx) pages to JSON
author: Joe <sdauwangzh@gmail.com>

scripts.publish:patch: npm run build-if-needed && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s [skip ci]" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build-if-needed && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s [skip ci]" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.publish:major: npm run build-if-needed && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s [skip ci]" && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
